content.rendered:
A romantic love shoot in beautiful Norway

During my stay in Norway for the wedding of Victoria and Carl, I met Adele. To be precise, it was in a cosy breakfast place that was called Spirenkafe. We spent hours talking about anything and everything, but especially about the photography profession. Just like me, Adele worked as a professional couple photographer in Norway.

“The cave on the Norwegian coast provided the perfect backdrop for a beautiful love shoot”

Time flies when you having fun, so we agreed to meet again for a love shoot. Adele’s friend Anders knows the area well, so we could immediately agree on a beautiful location for the shoot, a cave near the Norwegian coast. This location was cold and not that big, but above all breathtakingly beautiful.

I have a preference for beautiful places, and this is certainly one of my favourites. Dear Adele and Anders, I want to thank you for your boundless energy and humour! I had a great time and hopefully, we’ll see each other again. Maybe when you get married? Big hug!

“Your couple photographer in Norway”

Tip: would you also like to have beautiful photos taken at a location of your choice? Maybe Norway or another place. Please feel free to contact me to discuss the options for a love shoot. As a wedding and couple photographer, I like to think along with you.
Send me a message & let’s create something beautiful!

SWITCH TO ITALIAN
